Question: This person continued to work with CBS through a development deal and other projects.
Hints: This person was hired by CBS to be the official spokesman of the WWJ-TV during an advertising campaign from 1995 to 1998.
In 1987, this person attempted to return to film with the spy spoof Leonard Part 6.
In addition, this person in 1998 became the host of Kids Say the Darndest Things.
